OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord hospital/clinic site ( NYU vs UIC Jesse Brown VA Medical Center v site ) , number high-risk characteristic ( 1 v > 1 ) , race ( African American v non-African American [ i.e. , non-Hispanic White , Hispanic , Asian , ] ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral soy protein isolate beverage daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral casein placebo beverage daily .
